Aniket Gonnade

DevOps Engineer · Nagpur, Maharashtra · (+91) 9604907469 · aniketgonnade007@gmail.com

I am a DevOps Engineer with a passion for automating processes and improving system reliability. I have experience in cloud computing, containerization, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) practices. My goal is to bridge the gap between development and operations to deliver high-quality software efficiently.

    Interests

    Outside of work, I like keeping a healthy mix of fun and learning. I really enjoy traveling and exploring new places—it helps me reset and brings fresh perspectives. I’m also into hiking and playing sports whenever I get the chance, especially when I need a break from screens.

    When I’m indoors, you’ll usually find me listening to music (mostly EDM and pop), relaxing with some games, or diving into the latest tech trends. I’m always curious about how things work in the world of cloud and DevOps, so I spend a good chunk of time experimenting with tools, learning new concepts, and building small projects to sharpen my skills.

    Staying active, both mentally and physically, keeps me motivated and helps me grow continuously—personally and professionally.

    Role: DevOps Engineer

    Objective: Automate and deploy an e-commerce platform on AWS.

      • Environment: Windows, Linux

      Role: Full Stack Developer

      Objective: Develop an online system for real-time parking spot reservation and management.

      Environment: Windows

      Worked Tools/Technologies: Java, Spring Boot, ReactJS, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
